description: Hook definitions for Comby Skill Plugin

hooks.name: Pre-Tool Use Analysis
hooks.description: Analyzes context before tools are executed. Suggests Comby commands when appropriate.
hooks.impact: Provides tips and guidance without blocking execution

hooks.name: Post-Tool Use Analysis
hooks.description: Analyzes results after tools complete. Suggests follow-up actions.
hooks.impact: Analyzes tool results and suggests optimizations

hooks.name: File Change Analysis
hooks.description: Auto-analyzes files when they change in the project.
hooks.impact: Runs analysis on file modifications (can impact performance if enabled)

hooks.name: Pre-Commit Analysis
hooks.impact: Checks staged files for issues before committing

comby.hooks.fileChangeAnalysis.description: Enable automatic analysis when files change

comby.hooks.preCommitAnalysis.description: Enable automatic analysis before git commits

installation.description: All hooks are installed within the plugin. No modifications to ~/.claude/

enabling.howToEnable:
Edit ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md and add:
plugins:
  comby-skill:
    config:
      comby.hooks.fileChangeAnalysis: true
      comby.hooks.preCommitAnalysis: true
